alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Cache Valley, Utah Portion (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 13 at 2:10PM MST until February 15 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero in Bryce Canyon; as low as 15 below zero in Cache Valley. * WHERE...Cache Valley/Utah Portion and Bryce Canyon Country. * WHEN...From 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...These cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Unsheltered populations are at risk of hypothermia.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Cache Valley, Utah Portion
